table_description: Details about role assignments in Google Workspace, including assignee, scope, and conditions.

columns.name: roleAssignmentId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the role assignment.

columns.name: roleId
columns.description: The ID of the assigned role.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The type of the role assignment.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The etag identifier for the resource.

columns.name: assignedTo
columns.description: The entity to which the role is assigned (e.g., user or group).

columns.name: assigneeType
columns.description: The type of assignee (e.g., USER, GROUP, etc.).

columns.name: scopeType
columns.description: The scope type of the assignment (e.g., ORGANIZATION, UNIT, etc.).

columns.name: orgUnitId
columns.description: The ID of the organizational unit to which the role is assigned.

columns.name: condition
columns.description: A condition that must be met for the role assignment to apply.
